name: Up ‽ - Reflex Game
description:
Turn your phone and keep the arrow pointed up. Pop the flying meteors.

See how long you last.

-------

"This game really is harder than you think, but it's definitely a lot of fun!" - SJudd902

"Awesome graphics!!! It's harder than it looks and totally addictive!! My new favorite game!!" - Creed30

Tutorial, Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements included.
